Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.twitter.penguin</groupId>
  <artifactId>korean-text</artifactId>
  <version>2.4.3-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.twitter.penguin:korean-text:jar:2.4.3-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.twitter.penguin" name="korean-text" rev="2.4.3-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="korean-text" type="jar" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.twitter.penguin', module='korean-text', version='2.4.3-SNAPSHOT')
)

Grails

compile 'com.twitter.penguin:korean-text:2.4.3-SNAPSHOT'

Leiningen

[com.twitter.penguin/korean-text "2.4.3-SNAPSHOT"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.twitter.penguin" %% "korean-text" % "2.4.3-SNAPSHOT"
